Hello everyone!

I hope someone can help me, in the contacts we have a field that is of file type and I want to be able to upload files through the API to the specific contact but I am not even sure which endpoint I should use. If anyone can give me some light because the document is not clear to me what I should do...

Thank you !
Hey Laura, you can achieve this with the Files API endpoint: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files>
